mcq.statement: Which of the following was NOT a participant from the Muslim League at the First Round Table Conference?
mcq.one_liner: Among the Muslim League participants at the First Round Table Conference, **A. K. Fazlul Huq** was indeed present along with Sir Aga Khan, Maulana Muhammad Ali Jauhar, Muhammad Shafi, Muhammad Ali Jinnah, and Zafarullah Khan.

suggestions.topic: Quaid-e-Azam as President of Muslim League
